summary: Controversial radio host Alex Jones presents his theory that the newly elected 44th president of The United States is merely a puppet in a conspiracy to loot the American public and orchestrate a totalitarian world government.
cast: Francis Boyle|Gerald Celente|Daniel Estulin|Alex Jones|KRS-One|Barack Obama|Webster Tarpley|Jesse Ventura
keywords: conspiracy theory|conspiracy|new world order|reference to barack obama
title: The Obama Deception
